title: 最长优雅子数组 (Longest Nice Subarray)
content: 思路: // @Title: 最长优雅子数组 (Longest Nice Subarray) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-11 19:35:40 // @Runtime: 5 ms // @Memory: 54.7 MB // @comment: // @flag: class Solution { public int longestNiceSubarray(int[] nums) { int left=0,right=0,len=0; while(right<nums.length){ if(!checkPerfer(left,right,nums)){ left++; }else{ len=Math.max(len,right-left+1); right++; } } return len; } boolean checkPerfer(int left,int right,int[] nums){ if(left>right){ return false; } if(left==right){ return true; } for(;left<right;left++){ for(int j=left+1;j<=right;j++){ if((nums[left]&nums[right])!=0){ return false; } } } return true; } }
